channel.title: Can Auxy Toms sound like this?
channel.description:
https://youtu.be/V36GqD_19WI The Tom roll around 18 seconds into this song
I’d say they kind of have that Phil Collins dry sound?
I’ve been trying to get this sound for a while. If someone could help, I’d really appreciate it :slight_smile:

item.title: Can Auxy Toms sound like this?
item.dc:creator: sn.ow.y
item.description:
Yeah I think I was referring to the ones under percussion in nu disco dynamite. I think if you pitch them down a couple of tones they could work. The other samples that I’m thinking of now are the toms from the 808 from mars pack. I think they’re under the percussion section if I’m not mistaken, and they might work in a similar way. Also, there’s a greater selection of toms in that 808 pack.

Read full topic
item.source: Can Auxy Toms sound like this?

item.title: Can Auxy Toms sound like this?
item.dc:creator: YeahMarcYeah
item.description:
But there aren’t really any Toms under Nu Disco.

There are like 2 or 3 under percussion. And those don’t sound that great,

Do you mean Neurofunk?

item.dc:creator: YeahMarcYeah
item.description:
Thanks!

But there aren’t really any Toms under Nu Disco.
There are like 2 or 3 under percussion.

Do you mean Neurofunk?

Are you a big Washed Out fan too?

item.source: Can Auxy Toms sound like this?

item.title: Can Auxy Toms sound like this?
item.dc:creator: sn.ow.y
item.description:
Oh I love this song so much…

I think the best way to achieve toms like that is to probably later two toms together: one from leviathan 2 that has a lot of low end, and that you can pitch down a bit, and the other from nu disco dynamite that you would also pitch down slightly to get that top end “doosh” sound. Finding and importing a sample would probably be easier, but that’s my thoughts if you wanted to try it using exclusively drum packs in Auxy.

Read full topic
item.source: Can Auxy Toms sound like this?

item.title: Can Auxy Toms sound like this?
item.dc:creator: ThoughtfulNoise
item.description:
There’s a bajillion toms across the packs. Pretty sure there’s some gated tomes in there.
Add a little reverb.

You might need to take the closest one, then use pitch automation.

Browse by category, then start looking in the Leviathan 2 pack.

Read full topic
